com.uce.userlab.haptics
Class DeviceException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.uce.userlab.haptics.DeviceException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DeviceException
extends java.lang.Exception

This Class represents an Exception that is thrown by Haptic Device objects to indicate that has been a problem with the device for whatever reason.

See Also:

Parameters:
source - The source object that the error occured in
message - A String of the message decribing the type of error
errorCode - The error code for the exception
internalErrorCode - The error code from the device
